summary: Add 10MB size limit to JSON file loading to prevent DoS attacks
approach: Add file size check using path.stat().st_size before read_text() call
verification_targets_achieved: File size >10MB triggers ValueError with descriptive message
Test creates 11MB JSON file and verifies rejection
Size check happens before memory allocation
risks_limitations: 10MB limit is arbitrary but reasonable for todo lists
Legitimate large todo lists will need alternative storage
No migration path for existing large files

security_impact.attack_vector: --db CLI parameter accepts arbitrary file paths
security_impact.impact_prevented: Memory exhaustion DoS via large JSON files
security_impact.mitigation: Size check prevents loading oversized files

pr_note: GitHub Actions cannot create PRs - user must run 'gh pr create' manually
manual_pr_command: gh pr create --title "[AUTOFIX][ISSUE-1868][CANDIDATE-1] fix: add 10MB size limit to JSON file loading to prevent DoS" --base master
